name: スライム も たぬき
name_original: スライム も たぬき
description:
Navigate the terrain and experience an untold story of friendship between a slime and a penguin. Use the slime to hang, fling and bounce your way into unreachable areas. In development.

Tips: 

hold any button for 10 seconds to reset the game.

hold J for 2 seconds to activate slime friend from any distance.

while slime is activated you can pick him up!
